justification: “The Eating Disorder Examination Questionnaire 6.0 (EDE-Q…) is a 28-item self-report instrument… The global score from the EDE-Q was used to measure eating disorder symptom severity.”

“The Clinical Impairment Assessment (CIA… ) is a 16-item questionnaire that assesses impairment due to one's eating disorder across life domains… A global score of impairment is obtained by summing items.”
construct: Clinical impairment due to eating disorder

measured_by: Structured Clinical Interview for DSM-5 (SCID-5) eating-disorder modules
justification: “Study personnel determined eating disorder diagnoses by administering the eating disorder modules from the Structured Clinical Interview for DSM-5.”
“Exclusion criteria and co-occurring disorders were assessed using the Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview.”
construct: Co-occurring psychiatric disorders and exclusion criteria
